name: Lux Lips: Lip Balm
description: I am a LIP BALM JUNKIE. Its true. When I designed my lip balms, I used shea butter as the main ingredient, rather than beeswax. The result is a creamier balm that glides on your lips and stays on without getting sticky.

name: Exfoliating Scrub Delicioso! 4 oz.
description:
Exfoliating scrubs are AWESOME. Depending on the type of scrub, you can use them all over your body, including your face! What type of exfoliation are you looking for?

Sugar is gentle enough to clean your face and body
Coffee is a miracle worker and is best for exfoliating cellulite. Thank you, caffiene!

Salt is best for hardcore exfoliation, like feet or calluses

~Choose from the following scents:
Pink Lemonade [SUGAR]
sweet and girly, and the scrub is even colored Pink!

Fresh [SUGAR]
Be your own Downy commercial! Fresh is clean and airy, perfect for those who want something different and natural.

Warm Vanilla Sugar [SUGAR]
Warm, sweet, and rich.

Just Desserts [SUGAR]
sweet, with hints of cinnamon and baked cookies. a customer favorite!

Irish Cream [COFFEE]
Coffee with hints of mint for a fresh, clean scent.

Vanilla Latte [COFFEE]
Warm, caffinated, vanilla, deliciousness
